mean_cn: v. 解释，释义；  n. 转述，释义
mean_en: to say (something that someone else has said or written) using different words
word_etyma: para类似 + phrase说法 → paraphrase 释义
short_phrase: He will paraphrase the book's ideas.
sentence: To paraphrase the famous saying, success comes from failure.
sentence_trans: 这句名言的意思是说，成功源于失败。
